Doubts:

16-2=14

public class AssignmentEvenNumber {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		for(int i=1;i<=100;i++)
		{
			if(i%2==0)
			{
				System.out.println(i);
			}
		}
	}

}
